issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
CloudFormation JSON response messages include some internal properties such as "CallerContext" and "CorrelationId". This bug was most likely introduced in 4.1.1 with the fix for EUCA-10616.

We should not include internal message properties when creating the JSON response.
fields.summary: CloudFormation JSON response messages include internal properties

comments.body: I am working on this as it relates to a 4.2 change, leaving unconfirmed for scrub in case we want to also put the fix in 4.1.x.
